DescriptionData.Title: Mehron SynWax FX Molding Wax (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron SynWax is a pliable fx special effects molding wax that is can easily used to form cuts and other molded shapes. SynWax can be used to smooth the edges of prosthetic pieces, to cover eyebrows or to add features to characters for performances, like a warts on a witch's nose and other wax special effects. SynWax is a propriety blend of specially developed synthetic waxes developed by Mehron and less sticky than other fx special effects molding wax. 1.5 ounce size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 1 ounce Mehron SynWax container will give 4-20 applications, depending on if you're making small warts or large scars
